entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Greater Napanee
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:15 PM EST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 6:10 PM EST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Snow at times heavy. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy in the morning. Snow at times heavy beginning in the afternoon. Amount 5 cm. Wind becoming east 20 km/h early in the afternoon. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 14 in the morning and minus 7 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 6:10 PM EST Tuesday 24 January 2023
